ai-tha-ap170:1.2_0: I am a son of the King.
ai-tha-ap170:2.1_0: The Fortunate One consented by maintaining silence.
ai-tha-ap170:2.3_0: and having mastered their psychic powers,
ai-tha-ap170:2.4_0: I’m not stuck in the air.
ai-tha-ap170:3.2_0: As a bad one runs back from behind,
ai-tha-ap170:3.3_0: I practiced confidence in my mind:
ai-tha-ap170:3.4_0: “The Buddha is the best, the best,
ai-tha-ap170:4.1_0: if he makes his four eons;
ai-tha-ap170:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap170:4.4_0: as is the fruit of what is hard.
ai-tha-ap170:5.1_0: Seven measures have been strayed for seven eons.
ai-tha-ap170:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Divine.
ai-tha-ap170:8.1_0: the eighth (followers) of the Elder Nun Uttiya,
